Hold on to those MR games!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2006 Topics (Year of the Mercury Drop): Hold on to those MR games!
By MR. Champion on Saturday, December 2, 2006 - 10:13 am:

I was foolish a year or so ago and sold my monster rancher 4. So now I just got through spending $63.00 at amazon for a new copy. Even used ones are no less than 40 after taxes. Unless your lucky enough to score one at gamestop. Good luck on that. Mine hasnt seen it in months....

I assume this is because they arent making them anymore. Correct Lisa?

I fear that unless alot of us start clamoring for another MR, it could be more than a while....

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, December 2, 2006 - 08:28 pm:

Yeah, most games are only printed once or twice and that's it, the stores move on to the next title. It's like trying to buy a copy of last week's newspaper, very difficult.
